name: @AstralProtocol/astralprotocol
description: To create decentralized applications that leverage spatial data and location information, we need to be able to store and access spatial data in ways that ensure it is simple and reliable for Web3 developers to work with. This is the purpose of the Astral Protocol: to create the bindings between Web3 and spatial data technologies.

scripts.lint: bun run lint:sol && bun run prettier:check
scripts.test:coverage:report: forge coverage --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
